    • Player

      public Player​(String name, int sleepTime, boolean manualNextMsg, boolean database)
      Constructor of a player
      Parameters:
      name - name of player
      sleepTime - time between messages
      manualNextMsg - true if player wants to control flow of game
      database - true if data should be loaded from database

      public Card removeCard​(int pos)
      Removes a card from the players hand
      Parameters:
      pos - position of card in players hand, counting from 0!
      Returns:
      null if no card was found otherwise card in position pos

    • removeCard

      public boolean removeCard​(Card card)
      Overloaded removeCard function to remove a card by reference
      Parameters:
      card - card to be removed
      Returns:
      true if card was remove, false if card was not found

    • chooseCard

      public boolean chooseCard​(Table table)
      Function to let the player choose a card Sets isActive according to the players action Player chose a card --> isActive = false Player wasnt able to choose a card --> isActive = false Player didnt choose a card --> isActive = true
      Parameters:
      table - the current playing field
      Returns:
      true if card was chosen, false if no card was chosen

    • checkEndRound

      protected boolean checkEndRound​(Table table)
      Function to check if the turn of a player has to end because he cant choose a card
      Parameters:
      table - the current instance of the table
      Returns:
      true if player has no option, false if he does

      Returns:

    • mintomax

      public boolean mintomax​(LuckCard lC, int min, int max)
      Function to perfrom a ONETOTHREE or FOURTOSIX luckCard action !Removes the Card from the players hand!
      Parameters:
      lC - the card the player chose
      min - the min value the player can choose
      max - the max value the player can choose
      Returns:
      true if player selected a valid value and his diceCount was changed, false if he didnt
